steps.title: Welcome to RoadRecorder
steps.description: Track your journey in real-time with location monitoring via GPS device. To provide accurate real-time tracking, please enable GPS. This allows us to track your location and enhance your experience.

steps.title: Forground Location Permission
steps.description: Driver locations are collected from the precise device’s native location service to pinpoint a driver’s latitude and longitude while the app is actively running and visible.

steps.title: Background Location Service
steps.description:
Getting user location is a crucial when the app is not visible. To enable 'background location' on your device, click 'Enable' and move to -> Permissions. Select Location and choose 'Allow all the time' or 'Always'.
After that, under 'Battery usage' make sure to select 'Unrestricted' option.

steps.title: That's it! you are ready to start
steps.description: Now we can provide you accurate real-time tracking and enhance your experience.
